description:
***Pre-BLACK FRIDAY SALE*** Lowest price ever!

Your weather forecast in a simple infographic.
Beautiful + Informative + Fast. 36 hours + 7 days + 12 months!
◆ #1 Weather App in USA, UK, Canada, Germany, Spain, Greece, Netherlands, HK, Sweden, India, Iceland, Taiwan, and 25 more countries
◆ Featured by Apple
◆ "My primary weather app" – John Gruber of Daring Fireball

VISUAL LINE - Temperature, condition, and precipitation on one visual graph forecasted by 36 hours, 7 days, or 12 months. Available Worldwide.

SUPER ACCURATE - Forecast.io super accurate weather data (19 different sources!) and hyperlocal rain prediction.

HYPER LOCAL RAIN PREDICTION - State of the art rain forecasting down to the minute in the US, UK, Ireland, parts of Canada, and Puerto Rico. Powered by Dark Sky.

MONTHLY AVERAGES - Average temperatures, precipitation, rain days, snow days, and more for any location in the world. Perfect for travel planning.

SEVERE WEATHER WARNING REPORTS - see and share NOAA severe weather alerts in US & UK.

AND EVEN MORE
◆ NO background location tracking. Ever.
◆ NO battery drain
◆ Worldwide
◆ Zip codes
◆ Huge airport database
◆ Save space on your phone - super small app size (1.7 MB or 0.0017 GB)

◆ Individual prediction icon for each hour or day
◆ Forecasts in normal language (not machine speak)
◆ "Feels Like" temperature
◆ Average temperature for each day
◆ Humidity
◆ Wind speed and direction
◆ Sunrise time
◆ Sunset time

◆ Avg High and Low temp for each month (plan your vacation!)
◆ Average Total Rainfall for each month
◆ Average Daily rainfall for each month
◆ Monthly Snow days (for the perfect ski trip!)
◆ Monthly Dry days
◆ Monthly Fog days

Compatible with iOS 8 - iOS 6.
trackCensoredName: Weather Line - Accurate Forecast, Temperature Trend, and Monthly Average
trackName: Weather Line - Accurate Forecast, Temperature Trend, and Monthly Average
releaseNotes:
Big performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

+ Improved performance
+ Improved sharing the app
+ Improved sharing Severe Weather Warnings
+ Added URL scheme compatibility
+ Short term rain prediction for Ireland, parts of Canada, and Puerto Rico
